main.name: Aisha
main.bio: My name is Aisha Jackson! I received a B.S. in Computer Science at Spelman College and a B.S. in Computer Engineering at Georgia Tech. Iâ€™m currently a Software Engineer at Nike in Portland, OR through their Technology Rotation Program. I have a passion for full stack development and for initiatives that focus on diversity and inclusion within the workplace, especially within technology. Feel free to read my resume below to learn more about my experiences.
